instructions_to_main_agent: Use 'Oswald' font for all headings to give a strong, industrial feel.
Use 'Inter' for body text for maximum readability.
Primary buttons should be 'Deep Navy' (Slate 900) with sharp corners (rounded-sm).
Use 'Safety Orange' (Orange 500) sparingly for high-priority CTAs and alerts.
Layouts should be dense and grid-based, reflecting precision and engineering.
For the Job Board, use a clean list view with clear trade code badges.
For the Store, use a clean grid with white backgrounds for product images.
Ensure all interactive elements have hover states that increase contrast.
Follow the 'Performance Pro' archetype: minimal shadows, strong borders, high contrast.
universal_guidelines: Do not use generic centered layouts; prefer left-aligned text for readability.
Use 2-3x more spacing than typical designs for breathing room.
Every interaction needs micro-animations (hover, focus, active).
Ensure text contrast meets WCAG AA standards.
Use 'data-testid' attributes for all interactive elements.
